message:
As a Christmas/ Mawlid gift to other Geeks I would like to share this amazing article on consultant and what it means to be a consultant. I love the author's approach to defining what consulting is and going beyond  the everyday notion that a consultant is just another word for "contractor"

I want to draw your attention to the word "conscious", you will definitely be hearing this word a lot in the future.
story: Muhammad Al Rabbani shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: BEST PRACTICES IN CONSULTING - Conscious Consulting: What Clients Want – And Consultants Don’t...
caption: consciousbusinessblog.com
description: Run a Google search and you’ll find over 606,000,000 hits for “consulting”. Yes, that’s right: six hundred six million. Consulting today is such a wide category that it’s impossible to define it. W...
